title: Now There’s a Platypod for Everyone!
description: If you’ve spent any time in the photography world over the past few years, you’ve probably heard the name Platypod tossed around in conversations about travel gear, tripod alternatives, or clever tools for tight spaces.  What started as a quirky, flat tripod base has evolved into something much bigger—a full ecosystem of smart tools that help photographers stay light, creative, and nimble in the field.  Several new products this year alone including Delta, Traveler, MagGrip and Tab—all to help get you started on your next photography journey.   Also, if you want to learn more about what we do and Photography in general, join over 7500 subscribers to our YouTube channel. Just search on YouTube for “platypod channel” (or click here) where we release a new video once a week to help you along with your imaging.  For more information on our products as well as helpful tutorials please visit us over at www.platypod.com  The post Now There’s a Platypod for Everyone!  appeared first on Lightroom Killer Tips.
author: KelbyOne
